separator.description: The string used to separate the breadcrumbs
separator.description_zh: 用于分隔痕迹导航的字符串

active-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc: The color used to color the separator, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

gutter.type: none / xs / sm / md / lg / xl
gutter.description: The gutter value allows you control over the space between the breadcrumb elements.
gutter.description_zh: gutter 值允许您控制痕迹导航元素之间的空间。

separator-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
separator-color.desc: The color used to color the separator, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
separator-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

align.type: left / center / right / between / around / evenly
align.description: Specify how to align the breadcrumbs horizontally
align.description_zh: 指定如何水平对齐痕迹导航

slots.name: separator
slots.description: HTML or component you can slot in to separate the breadcrumbs
slots.description_zh: 您可以插入以分隔痕迹导航的 HTML 或组件
